actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 94-965.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #140 (278-87).

official_title: Resolution to provide for the expenses of the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct, for the investigations authorized by House Resolution 1042.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 94-965) Authorizes the expenditure of $150,000 by the House Committee on Standards of Official Conduct for inquiries and investigations conducted pursuant to H. Res. 1042 (inquiry into publication of text of Select Committee on Intelligence report). Allocates $130,000 to be expended for the procurement of consultant services. Requires the chairman of the Committee to furnish the Committee on House Administration information with respect to any study or investigation intended to be financed from such funds.

titles.title: Resolution to provide for the expenses of the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct, for the investigations authorized by House Resolution 1042.
